last_episode_to_air.name: Hearts 'N' Smurfs
last_episode_to_air.overview: Gargamel's Dutch doppelganger puts a spell on Brainy that causes all his fellow Smurfs to spread nastiness when they take over Cupid's job.

name: The Smurfs
overview: Classic Saturday-morning cartoon series featuring magical blue elf-like creatures called Smurfs. The Smurfs, named for their personalities, inhabit a village of mushroom houses in an enchanted forest. These loveable creatures are led by Papa Smurf and live carefree... except for one major threat to their existance: Gargamel, an evil but inept wizard who lives in a stone-built house in the forest; and his feline companion, the equally nasty Azrael.

episodes.name: The Astrosmurf
episodes.overview: The Smurfs help fulfill Dreamy's wish to travel to the stars by disguising themselves as Swoofs on another planet.

episodes.name: Jokey's Medicine
episodes.overview: The Smurfs end up trapped in Gargamel's lair when they decide to get even with Jokey.

episodes.name: Vanity Fare
episodes.overview: Gargamel hides in a magic mirror to catch some unsuspecting Smurfs.

episodes.name: St. Smurf and the Dragon
episodes.overview: A baby dragon has an insatiable appetite for the berries that Papa Smurf needs for his invisibility formula.

episodes.name: The Magical Meanie
episodes.overview: Brainy and Clumsy discover a badly behaving genie who's only nice when somebody says the magic words "pumpernickel pickle".

episodes.name: Sorcerer Smurf
episodes.overview: Gargamel disguises himself as a long-lost Sorceror Smurf.

episodes.name: Bewitched, Bothered, and Besmurfed
episodes.overview: Hogatha's amulet causes some of Smurfette's wishes to come true when she wears it.

episodes.name: King Smurf
episodes.overview: Brainy becomes king of the village and starts a civil war when Papa Smurf's gone.

episodes.name: Soup a la Smurf
episodes.overview: Bigmouth's soup becomes unappetizing when Papa Smurf puts a formula in it that disfigures the hungry ogre.

episodes.name: All That Glitters Isn't Smurf
episodes.overview: Every Smurf mistakenly believes that Papa Smurf lost his magic touch.

episodes.name: Dreamy's Nightmare
episodes.overview: Dreamy's trip around the world is cut short when Gargamel captures him

episodes.name: Romeo and Smurfette
episodes.overview: Hefty and Handy, not to mention everyone else, compete for the amourous attention of Smurfette.

episodes.name: The Magic Egg
episodes.overview: A magic egg that grants every Smurf their fondest wishes creates chaos.

episodes.name: Smurphony In 'C'
episodes.overview: Harmony discovers a magical horn that puts its listeners into an eternal sleep.

episodes.name: Sideshow Smurfs
episodes.overview: The Smurfs enter a human village to rescue Smurfette and Clumsy from a mean showmaster.

episodes.name: Supersmurf
episodes.overview: Brainy tries using brute force instead of brains to retrieve his village's stolen food supply from Bigmouth.

episodes.name: Paradise Smurfed
episodes.overview: Lazy dreams of discovering a hidden paradise that hides a nightmare.

episodes.name: Sir Hefty
episodes.overview: Hefty becomes a knight to slay a dragon that's been setting fire to the village.

episodes.name: The Baby Smurf
episodes.overview: Gargamel transforms himself into an blue infant to destroy the village from within.

episodes.name: The Fake Smurf
episodes.overview: Hogatha's impersonation of a Smurf backfires when she loses her tail.

episodes.name: Painter and Poet
episodes.overview: Two creative Smurfs take their unappreciated talents with them when they flee to a deserted island.

episodes.name: Haunted Smurf
episodes.overview: Something is haunting a castle that the Smurfs discover when they leave the village in search for food.

episodes.name: The Purple Smurfs
episodes.overview: A purple fly bites Lazy, causing a tail-biting purple epidemic.

episodes.name: The Fountain of Smurf
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf becomes a Smurfling, and the Smurfs must find a way to restore him to normal with the help of Gargamel.

episodes.name: The Magnifying Mixture
episodes.overview: Brainy accidentally turns Hefty into a giant, who brings an even bigger problem into the village.

episodes.name: Foul Weather Smurf
episodes.overview: Handy's weather-controlling machine creates chaos in the climate.

episodes.name: The Hundredth Smurf
episodes.overview: Vanity's mirror reflection comes to life and does the opposite of what Vanity does.

episodes.name: The Abominable Snowbeast
episodes.overview: The Smurfs encounter a snow creature that turns out to be friendly with Smurfette.

episodes.name: Gargamel the Generous
episodes.overview: An accidental discovery of diamonds by Clumsy attracts Gargamel's attention.

episodes.name: The Smurfette
episodes.overview: Gargamel creates Smurfette as a pawn to destroy the Smurfs, and Papa Smurf changes her into a real Smurf to foil Gargamel's plan.

episodes.name: Now You Smurf 'Em, Now You Don't
episodes.overview: Underground trolls use a crystal ball that lets Smurfs see their fondest wishes in order to kidnap whoever touches it.

episodes.name: Spelunking Smurfs
episodes.overview: The Smurfs discover a cave with frozen food and a frozen ogre guarding it.

episodes.name: The Smurfs' Apprentice
episodes.overview: Clumsy turns himself into a dragon, and the Smurfs must help him return to normal.

episodes.name: Smurf-Colored Glasses
episodes.overview: Handy's magical glasses trick Smurfette into seeing Gargamel as handsome.

episodes.name: The Clockwork Smurf
episodes.overview: Handy's mechanical Smurf becomes a hero when he rescues Prince Gerard from his evil aunt.

episodes.name: Fuzzle Trouble
episodes.overview: A furry little creature becomes a multiplying menace.

episodes.name: Smurfette's Dancing Shoes
episodes.overview: The Smurfs split up to retrieve three treasures in order to rescue Smurfette from a forced marriage to a greedy troll.

episodes.name: The Smurfs and the Money Tree
episodes.overview: Gargamel's mother tests Greedy's avarice by planting a golden goodie tree outside his house.

episodes.name: The Smurf Who Couldn't Say No
episodes.overview: Pushover learns to be steadfast in his refusals when he and Scaredy must relight a mystical fire to calm a rampaging swamp monster.

episodes.name: The Adventures of Robin Smurf
episodes.overview: Vanity as Robin Hood must rescue Smurfette as Maid Marian from Brainy as the evil Prince John with the help of his merry   men.

episodes.name: The Cursed Country
episodes.overview: The Smurfs find a way to douse the flames of a fire-breathing dragon being used by an evil master to capture slaves for his diamond mine.

episodes.name: S-Shivering S-Smurfs
episodes.overview: Nobody pays any attention to Tracker's prediction of an early snowfall until it happens, and now they're angry with him.

episodes.name: Sister Smurf
episodes.overview: Smurfette and a human girl flee from their unappreciative families, only to be held prisoner by an old hag.

episodes.name: The Black Hellebore
episodes.overview: An evil wizard uses a deadly flower to put everyone in a trance.

episodes.name: Revenge of the Smurfs
episodes.overview: A bunch of disgruntled Smurfs try to get even with a human army that has rampaged the village.

episodes.name: The Three Smurfketeers
episodes.overview: It's an ""all for one and one for all"" adventure, brought to you by the boys (and the angel) in blue.

episodes.name: Heavenly Smurfs
episodes.overview: The Smurfs try tricking Gargamel into believing he has been sent to his final judgment.

episodes.name: It Came From Outer Smurf
episodes.overview: Dreamy's claim of seeing a visitor from another world is ignored until he retrieves a crystal that creates a windstorm.

episodes.name: The Sorcery of Maltrochu
episodes.overview: Johan, Peewit, and the Smurfs must restore a young royal who's gone to the dogs, courtesy of an evil baron who wants to marry the beautiful Genevieve.

episodes.name: Squeaky
episodes.overview: Smurfette learns to value the passage of life when her pet mouse dies.

episodes.name: The Kaplowey Scroll
episodes.overview: A translated scroll with a magic word that makes things disappear becomes dangerous when Grouchy uses it on Jokey.

episodes.name: The Goblin of Boulder Wood
episodes.overview: Peewit recounts his first encounter with Johan.

episodes.name: Gormandizing Greedy
episodes.overview: An overweight Greedy learns that it isn't healthy to overeat.

episodes.name: Waste Not, Smurf Not
episodes.overview: Handy's food processor causes the Smurfs to use food unproductively.

episodes.name: Johan's Army
episodes.overview: The Smurfs help Johan and Peewit protect the castle when his army's been rendered useless.

episodes.name: The Lost City of Yore
episodes.overview: Nosey's butting-in gets the other Smurfs in the middle of an argument over the evil Scepter of Yore.

episodes.name: Magic Fountain
episodes.overview: Johan, Peewit, and the Smurfs search for the magic fountain to energize an enslaved people.

episodes.name: The Imposter King
episodes.overview: Johan, Peewit, and the Smurfs must find the real king and stop his imposter.

episodes.name: For the Love of Gargamel
episodes.overview: Tracker learns to respect all life, even Gargamel's, when he helps Papa Smurf create a formula to restore Gargamel and Azrael from being turned to stone.

episodes.name: The A-Maze-Ing Smurfs
episodes.overview: The Smurfs meet Malchior the Magnificient inside his labyrinthine manor.

episodes.name: The Haunted Castle
episodes.overview: Johan, Peewit, and the Smurfs must help a ghost of a haunted castle find his rightful heir.

episodes.name: Smurfs At Sea
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf recounts Dreamy's adventures at sea.

episodes.name: One Good Smurf Deserves Another
episodes.overview: Clumsy gets a chance to repay Handy's bravery by rescuing him from a real monster.

episodes.name: The Blue Plague
episodes.overview: Brainy gives his fellow Smurfs a meal that makes them feel like chickens.

episodes.name: The Last Laugh
episodes.overview: Gargamel's giggle glitter causes uncontrollable fits of laughter in the Smurfs.

episodes.name: The Raven Wizard
episodes.overview: An evil wizard kidnaps Sabrina to magically transfer her youth onto himself, and Peewit comes to Sabrina's rescue.

episodes.name: The Ring of Castellac
episodes.overview: Johan, Peewit, and the Smurfs must return a drugged duke to his rightful place.

episodes.name: The Sky Is Smurfing, The Sky Is Smurfing
episodes.overview: Scaredy's warning of danger is taken seriously when a nearby volcano erupts.

episodes.name: Turncoat Smurf
episodes.overview: Everybody accuses Brainy of turning against them when he accidentally leads Gargamel into the village.

episodes.name: Return of Clockwork Smurf
episodes.overview: King Gerard seeks bravery of his own when his companion Clockwork is put out of the action and the king's uncle Leopold.

episodes.name: The Littlest Giant
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf helps a young runaway giant reunite with his own family.

episodes.name: Bubble, Bubble, Smurfs In Trouble
episodes.overview: Scaredy learns that he couldn't find bravery by hiding himself inside a bubble.

episodes.name: Smurf Van Winkle
episodes.overview: Lazy is tricked by the other Smurfs into believing he has slept his life away.

episodes.name: The Prince and the Peewit
episodes.overview: The court jester and his royal doppelganger switch places.

episodes.name: The Enchanted Baby
episodes.overview: Johan, Peewit, and the Smurfs must deliver a baby with magical powers to his parents.

episodes.name: Clumsy Smurfs the Future
episodes.overview: A glowing rock Clumsy finds gives him some glimpses into what's going to happen.

episodes.name: Sleepwalking Smurfs
episodes.overview: Gargamel uses Madame Trilby's magic flute to lead sleeping Smurfs out of their village.

episodes.name: Smurf Me No Flowers
episodes.overview: Lazy is led to believe that he has only a few days left to live, encouraging him to do some physical feats he hasn't thought of doing before.

episodes.name: The Good, The Bad, And The Smurfy
episodes.overview: The wizard Mordain, who seeks to overthrow the kingdom by turning his liege into a frog, abducts Papa Smurf and some   others.

episodes.name: A Mere Truffle
episodes.overview: Tracker loses his memory when he leads the other Smurfs on a truffle hunt.

episodes.name: The Stuff Dreams Are Smurfed Of
episodes.overview: Gargamel does his own version of Freddy Krueger when he invades the dreams of the Smurfs with the help of a magical dream crown.

episodes.name: The Box of Dirty Tricks
episodes.overview: Gargamel gives the Smurfs a destructive little present.

episodes.name: Papa's Wedding Day
episodes.overview: A charming woodnymph working for Lord Balthazar tricks Papa Smurf into marrying her.

episodes.name: All's Smurfy That End's Smurfy
episodes.overview: Gargamel steals fairy gold, and the fairies accuse the Smurfs of stealing it, leading into an all-out war that Papa Smurf must   stop.

episodes.name: Once In A Blue Moon
episodes.overview: A stork delivers a real Baby Smurf into the village on a rare night.

episodes.name: All Creatures Great And Smurf
episodes.overview: Natural nearly endangers the village when he brings home a wounded Azrael.

episodes.name: The Smurf Fire Brigade
episodes.overview: A rash of fires inspire the Smurfs to create an effective invention for fighting them.

episodes.name: The Winged Wizard
episodes.overview: Gargamel uses his flying inventions as a way to capture Smurfs.

episodes.name: Every Picture Smurfs A Story
episodes.overview: An evil artist tricks Painter into doing a lifelike portrait of Papa Smurf so that he can come to life and find his eternal inspiration.

episodes.name: The First Telesmurf
episodes.overview: Overgrown smurfmelon vines make for a new means of communication, and a new way for Gargamel to find the Smurfs.

episodes.name: Handy's Kite
episodes.overview: Handy and his high-flying crew are captured by Lord Balthasar.

episodes.name: The Magic Earrings
episodes.overview: Hogatha seduces Gargamel into giving her a pair of earrings that let her hear sounds from all over the world -- including Smurfs.

episodes.name: The Last Smurfberry
episodes.overview: Gargamel creates a smurfberry famine, causing the Smurfs to seek out across the seas to find more of the berries.

episodes.name: A Little Smurf Confidence
episodes.overview: Weakling gains strength from his own willpower when Papa Smurf gives him smurfberry jam to put on his nose and calling it Can Do Cream.

episodes.name: Hogatha's Heart Throb
episodes.overview: Gargamel tricks Hogatha into getting her bird call by disguising himself as the wizard of her dreams.

episodes.name: Born Rotten
episodes.overview: A furry little creature with a foul smell hatches in the village, attracting Gargamel's nose.

episodes.name: The Tear Of A Smurf
episodes.overview: An ugly hag is turned into a beautiful princess when some captured Smurfs shed some tears for her.

episodes.name: The Miracle Smurfer
episodes.overview: An impish charlatan tricks the Smurfs into giving him all their possessions to trade for his miracle tonic.

episodes.name: The Smurf Who Would Be King
episodes.overview: Dreamy dreams of being stranded in the kingdom of the Pookies, where he is king and must use his secret weapon against the Norf Nags.

episodes.name: How To Smurf A Rainbow
episodes.overview: Gargamel's in search for gold when the Smurfs create an incomplete rainbow.

episodes.name: Smurfette For A Day
episodes.overview: Hefty becomes a drag queen for a troll king.

episodes.name: Peewit Meets Bigmouth
episodes.overview: Peewit accidentally turns a young bratty prince into a chicken. And even worse, Bigmouth feels like having chicken tonight...chicken soup, that is!

episodes.name: Lumbering Smurfs
episodes.overview: Clockwork helps the Smurfs protect King Gerard's forest from a rogue band of loggers.

episodes.name: Handy's Sweetheart
episodes.overview: Handy falls in love with a mermaid seeking help for her ailing father.

episodes.name: Speak For Yourself Farmer Smurf
episodes.overview: Farmer poses himself as another Smurf to get the amorous attention of Smurfette.

episodes.name: A Hovel Is Not A Home
episodes.overview: Gargamel tries to capture Smurfs with the help of his Great Book of Spells in order to buy himself a bigger home.

episodes.name: Forget Me Smurfs
episodes.overview: An early-blooming flower on an early-breaking spring day causes the Smurfs to forget when the village dam is about to burst.

episodes.name: The Grumpy Gremlin
episodes.overview: A gourmet gremlin with a foul-smelling concoction seeks a new home when Peewit accidentally chops down his tree.

episodes.name: Clumsy Luck
episodes.overview: Clumsy proves how lucky he really is when he escapes a meteor that crashed into his house.

episodes.name: Willpower Smurfs
episodes.overview: Jokey tests his fellow Smurfs' ability to resist temptation, and later Gargamel's when Harmony is captured.

episodes.name: Baby Smurf Is Missing
episodes.overview: A couple of poachers kidnap Baby Smurf, thinking that he is a leprechaun.

episodes.name: The Smurfs' Time Capsule
episodes.overview: A druid that escapes captivity from a tree seeks out Papa Smurf when his moonrock amulet is stolen.

episodes.name: Wedding Bells For Gargamel
episodes.overview: Gargamel accepts the courtship of a beautiful princess to get at her hope chest, which contains a map to the Smurf Village.

episodes.name: To Smurf A Thief
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf helps Homnibus clear the name of a young boy accused of stealing.

episodes.name: Greedy And The Porridge Pot
episodes.overview: Greedy borrows a magical porridge pot that buries the village in mush when Brainy gets a hold of it.

episodes.name: Harmony Steals The Show
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf goes to trial to dispute the origin of Harmony's ""ghostwritten"" symphony.

episodes.name: The Golden Smurf Award
episodes.overview: Hogatha transforms herself into a trophy to get some Smurfs for her beauty regimen.

episodes.name: The Moor's Baby
episodes.overview: The Smurfs must solve an algebra problem to free the Tooth Fairy and ease the teething pains of both Baby Smurf and a   visiting moor's baby.

episodes.name: Hefty's Heart
episodes.overview: Can Hefty find it in his heart to cure himself of the ""yellow hate disease""?

episodes.name: A Hug For Grouchy
episodes.overview: Grouchy bravely embraces a pixie under Chlorhydris' spell to break the power of the Wand of Ice.

episodes.name: The Magic Rattle
episodes.overview: A magic baby rattle falls into Baby Smurf's hands and an evil fairy wants it.

episodes.name: All Hallows' Eve
episodes.overview: Lazy is accidentally turned red by Mother Nature's autumn wand in preparation for Halloween and Jokey's birthday.

episodes.name: The Littlest Witch
episodes.overview: The Smurfs befriend a young witch, teaching her to do good, while stopping a bad witch by causing her to lose her powers for a year.

episodes.name: April Smurf Day
episodes.overview: Gargamel plays a trick of his own on the Smurfs by disguising himself as a smurfberry bush.

episodes.name: The Magic Stick
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf's magic stick that teleports things or cleans up things gets lost when Bigmouth starts chomping down their   smurfberry bushes.

episodes.name: Baby's First Christmas
episodes.overview: A Christmas-time special featuring the Smurfs! Baby Smurf is all set to enjoy the wonder and delight of her very own first Christmas. Then, the evil Chlorhydrus puts a nasty spell on Mr. Nicholas to keep him from spreading his holiday cheer. Fortunately, the resourceful Papa Smurf isn't about to take this sort of thing sitting down. Sending out a call for hrlp, he ralies his little blue buddies to help break the mean-spirited spell. Now, they're embarking on a Smurfish campaign to ensure that the joyful message of Christmas cheer and goodwill once again rings across the land!

episodes.name: Beauty Is Only Smurf Deep
episodes.overview: Periwinkle, the perfection-minded pixie, finds a kindred spirit in Vanity.

episodes.name: Wolf In Peewit's Clothing
episodes.overview: An evil wizard turns Peewit into a werewolf to capture some Smurfs to get Smurf sweat.

episodes.name: A Bell For Azrael
episodes.overview: Brainy's brilliant idea to put a bell on Azrael is used against the Smurfs when Gargamel puts his spell on the bell.

episodes.name: The Chief Record Smurf
episodes.overview: A lab accident gives Clumsy photographic memory, and Gargamel erases it with his babble bath.

episodes.name: Smurfing In Sign Language
episodes.overview: Laconia the mute wood elf teaches a magically soundless Poet the wonders of signing.

episodes.name: A Chip Off The Old Smurf
episodes.overview: Everybody contemplates Baby Smurf's future while a locust infestation attacks the forest.

episodes.name: A Gift For Papa's Day
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf tries to discreetly dispose a gift hat that he doesn't like wearing.

episodes.name: Good Neighbor Smurf
episodes.overview: Brainy proves himself to be a poor roommate when he has to bunk with someone else.

episodes.name: The Smurfstone Quest
episodes.overview: Handy, Hefty, and Lazy team up to find a crystal with healing powers.

episodes.name: Hats Off To Smurfs
episodes.overview: Vanity finds a new hat that disfigures his face when he splashes water on himself.

episodes.name: The Noble Stag
episodes.overview: Oh, ""deer""...Malcolm the Mean has turned King Gerard into a black stag.

episodes.name: Smurfy Acres
episodes.overview: Gargamel lures the Smurfs into another Smurf Village with the help of his Great Book of Spells.

episodes.name: No Time for Smurfs
episodes.overview: A few Smurfs cause all time to stop when they accidentally break Father Time's hourglass.

episodes.name: Symbols of Wisdom
episodes.overview: Brainy and Gargamel grow magical beards in order to gain respect.

episodes.name: Blue Eyes Returns
episodes.overview: Smurfette's orange horse friend returns when Gargamel floods the forest with magic beans.

episodes.name: The Secret Of The Village Well
episodes.overview: Everyone in the village is wondering what Clumsy's secret wish is.

episodes.name: Stop And Smurf The Roses
episodes.overview: Chlorhydris abducts Laconia and tries to kill her by killing off all her flowers.

episodes.name: Gingerbread Smurfs
episodes.overview: Brainy loses big time to Greedy in a bake-off when his magically-created gingerbread cookies come to life and take over the village.

episodes.name: Jokey's Shadow
episodes.overview: Jokey's shadow comes to life and causes trouble for him.

episodes.name: Jokey's Funny Bone
episodes.overview: Jokey gets more attention than he deserves when he claims he lost his funny bone.

episodes.name: Tick Tock Smurfs
episodes.overview: Brainy's new time schedule has the Smurfs rushing through their day, and it's making them feel stressed out.

episodes.name: The Master Smurf
episodes.overview: A magic crown turns Greedy into a mind-controlling tyrant, and Papa Smurf must find the other crown to get Greedy to lose   his.

episodes.name: Tailor's Magic Needle
episodes.overview: Brainy puts Tailor's clothesmaking skills to the test when his magical needle starts sticking it to the other Smurfs.

episodes.name: The Traveler
episodes.overview: A mysterious traveler from the east comes to calm the rage of a magical dragon.

episodes.name: A Pet For Baby Smurf
episodes.overview: Baby Smurf's glowing darling becomes a ghoulish danger.

episodes.name: The Incredible Shrinking Wizard
episodes.overview: A polluted muck pond causes Gargamel to shrink without limit, and only doing good deeds can restore him to normal.

episodes.name: Breakfast At Greedy's
episodes.overview: Lighter-than-air pancakes causes the Smurfs to float uncontrollably.

episodes.name: The Secret Of Shadow Swamp
episodes.overview: Grouchy tries to escape from his birthday with an adventurous troll.

episodes.name: The Trojan Smurf
episodes.overview: Gargamel hides inside a giant hollow statue of Papa Smurf to lure the Smurfs into taking him into the village.

episodes.name: Smurf The Other Cheek
episodes.overview: Dot, dot, who's nose got the spot? An unfriendly game of kick-tag is afoot

episodes.name: A Float Full Of Smurfs
episodes.overview: Gargamel and Azrael disguise themselves as rabbits for the Smurfs' autumn festival parade.

episodes.name: Smurfette's Sweet Tooth
episodes.overview: Her insatiable appetite for sweets gets out of control when her very touch turns everything into candy.

episodes.name: Smurf On Wood
episodes.overview: Take one toad, put Papa Smurf's cap on him, throw in a bunch of superstitious Smurfs who think it's a result of Papa Smurf making a wish at a magic tree, plus one wizard in search of that toad.

episodes.name: The Smurfomatic Smurfolator
episodes.overview: Handy builds his dream machine, which he uses against the tall weeds growing in the village.

episodes.name: Petrified Smurfs
episodes.overview: Peewit must get Selwyn and Tallulah to work together to reverse a spell that turned half the forest and the Smurf Village into stone before dawn.

episodes.name: Papa's Worry Warts
episodes.overview: A young wartless Wartmonger comes of age when a warted Papa Smurf passes his ""worry warts"" onto him.

episodes.name: Lazy's Slumber Party
episodes.overview: The Smurfs give Lazy a sleepless night he would rather forget.

episodes.name: The Pussywillow Pixies
episodes.overview: A lone Pixie befriends a Smurf lost in Pussywillow Hollow, and with the help of the other Smurfs they rescue her friends from being captured by the Wartmongers

episodes.name: The Bignose Dilemma
episodes.overview: Bignose, Gargamel, and Vanity magically switch noses.

episodes.name: The Smurfbox Derby
episodes.overview: A race from the top of the mountain falls flat when Gargamel arrives to steamroller the competition.

episodes.name: A Circus For Baby
episodes.overview: Hefty loses his fear of heights with the help of an elephant when he rescues Baby Smurf.

episodes.name: Babies In Wartland
episodes.overview: Baby Smurf finds himself on the throne with King Bullrush.

episodes.name: The Smurfwalk Cafe
episodes.overview: Handy and Greedy are in a dispute over who should get the credit for their accidental co-creation of a new frozen dessert.

episodes.name: The Smurfiest Of Friends
episodes.overview: Brainy learns to value his friendship with Clumsy when he helps Brainy escape being held prisoner by an ungrateful admirer.

episodes.name: Never Smurf Off 'Til Tomorrow
episodes.overview: Handy accuses Lazy of slacking off on the job when a hurricane carries them and several other Smurfs off into an erupting   volcano, but Lazy manages to redeem himself.

episodes.name: Bigmouth Smurf
episodes.overview: He's big! He's blue! He thinks he's a Smurf! And what's worse, he's Bigmouth!

episodes.name: Baby's Enchanted Didey
episodes.overview: A fragment of Gargamel's magic cloth becomes a new diaper that lets Baby Smurf fly.

episodes.name: The Man On The Moon
episodes.overview: The Smurfs convince the Moon Man of his importance when he takes an unexpected vacation.

episodes.name: Smurfette's Golden Tresses
episodes.overview: Hogatha wants natural blond hair like Smurfette's, so she captures Smurfette and forces her to cut her hair.

episodes.name: The Whole Smurf And Nothing But The Smurf
episodes.overview: Smurfette's gift of gab really makes a mess of things when Gargamel casts a lying spell on her.

episodes.name: Gargamel's Giant
episodes.overview: Gargamel uses smurfberries as a substitute for choke cherries to bring a giant to life.

episodes.name: The Patchwork Bear
episodes.overview: The Smurfs help an animated teddy bear find courage when his princess is held prisoner.

episodes.name: Hefty And The Wheelsmurfer
episodes.overview: Hefty regains his confidence in the face of disability when he tries out Handy's invention.

episodes.name: Hopping Cough Smurfs
episodes.overview: The Smurfs must find the hopping crane to cure themselves of a bouncing disease.

episodes.name: The Little Orange Horse With The Gold Shoes
episodes.overview: Smurfette befriends a magical flying horse who lost his shoe sliding down a rainbow.

episodes.name: Monster Smurfs
episodes.overview: A magically deformed Smurfette befriends a treestump monster.

episodes.name: The Bad Place
episodes.overview: Muddy aliens have landed in the village, and the Smurfs learn to live with them as they seek help to repair their ship.

episodes.name: Smurfing For Ghost's
episodes.overview: There's something strange in the neighborhood of Quarrel Castle. Who does Peewit the house-sitter call? Brainy and Clumsy.

episodes.name: The Gargoyle Of Quarrel Castle
episodes.overview: Selwyn and Tallulah's pet gargoyle finds friends in the Smurf Village and accidentally sets loose a three-headed hydra.

episodes.name: Smurfiplication
episodes.overview: Gargamel uses a multiplying machine on Brainy to get his six Smurfs for making gold.

episodes.name: Gargamel's Misfortune
episodes.overview: A pair of charlatan gypsies help the Smurfs rescue Smurfette and Dreamy from Gargamel, who tricks the gypsies with a bag of painted rocks.

episodes.name: Stuck On Smurfs
episodes.overview: Togetherness isn't always a good thing when Gargamel makes all the Smurfs get really attached to each other.

episodes.name: Puppy
episodes.overview: Hominbus' magical puppy arrives in the village with a magic locket.

episodes.name: Papa's Day Off
episodes.overview: Homibus gives Papa Smurf the chance to see how the other Smurfs would handle an emergency situation if he wasn't there.

episodes.name: The Smurflings
episodes.overview: Natural, Snappy, and Slouchy get a second childhood with the help of Father Time.

episodes.name: He Who Smurfs Last
episodes.overview: Chlorhydris causes all the Smurfs except for Papa Smurf and Baby Smurf to lose their sense of humor.

episodes.name: Baby's First Word
episodes.overview: What can possibly ruin a joyous occasion like this? Baby Smurf can say that in one word.

episodes.name: The Masked Pie Smurfer
episodes.overview: Jokey lets the custard fly as a masked prankster.

episodes.name: Sassette
episodes.overview: The Smurflings create a female counterpart for themselves and a sister for Smurfette.

episodes.name: Papa's Puppy Prescription
episodes.overview: Puppy gets a warm nose while Papa Smurf gets a cold nose.

episodes.name: Poet's Writer's Block
episodes.overview: Poet finds new inspiration under pressure when he has to write a poem for a princess.

episodes.name: Smurf A Mile In My Shoes
episodes.overview: Jokey learns a lesson in humility when he comes to the aid of a tortured sand troll that he teased.

episodes.name: Dreamy's Pen Pals
episodes.overview: Dreamy realizes that the Swoofs aren't real at the same time a real alien pays him a visit.

episodes.name: Papa's Flying Bed
episodes.overview: An evil spell cast by Gargamel on Papa Smurf's new bed causes him and some other Smurfs to fly off to new adventures.

episodes.name: Mud Wrestling Smurfs
episodes.overview: Clumsy steps into the ring against the Wartmongers while Papa Smurf plans an escape.

episodes.name: The Sand Witch
episodes.overview: A lonely witch learns to appreciate her friendship with a sea monster when he shows up with Baby Smurf.

episodes.name: Kow-Tow, We Won't Bow
episodes.overview: Smurfette escapes from the Wartmongers with the help of Puppy.

episodes.name: Bigmouth's Friend
episodes.overview: Bigmouth comes to the aid of Clockwork when Gargamel and Lord Balthasar's mechanical menace attacks King Gerard's castle.

episodes.name: Wild And Wooly
episodes.overview: Wooly and the Smurflings help protect a flock of sheep in exchange for wool.

episodes.name: The Dark-Ness Monster
episodes.overview: Brainy loses his glasses and finds himself relying on Clumsy.

episodes.name: The Grouchiest Game In Town
episodes.overview: Grouchy plays to win against the Games Master in a game where his fellow Smurfs are the pawns.

episodes.name: Queen Smurfette
episodes.overview: Smurfette's reign as queen for the day raises a ruckus when Father Time forgets to end the day.

episodes.name: Marco Smurf And The Pepper Pirates
episodes.overview: A brave seafaring Smurf gets himself in trouble with pepper pirates.

episodes.name: Educating Bigmouth
episodes.overview: The Smurfs help Bigmouth win back the heart of Bignose.

episodes.name: Brainy Smurf, Friend To All The Animals
episodes.overview: Brainy proves himself to be a role model to young Natural.

episodes.name: The Comet Is Coming
episodes.overview: A torn message from Papa Smurf makes the Smurfs mistakenly believe that the world is coming to an end when a rare comet passes by

episodes.name: Happy Unhappiness Day To You
episodes.overview: Gargamel unsuccessfully searches for Smurfs on a day of emotional cleansing.

episodes.name: The Great Slime Crop Failure
episodes.overview: The Wartmongers kidnap Farmer and the Smurflings in order to help restore their slime crops.

episodes.name: Papa's Family Album
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf recounts his first adventure with his little Smurfs to the Smurflings.

episodes.name: Love Those Smurfs
episodes.overview: Chlorhydris casts a spell on the Smurfs that makes them love only themselves, and a few Smurfs must deliver humble pie to restore their love for each other.

episodes.name: Mutiny On The Smurf
episodes.overview: The Smurflings prove themselves to be a capable crew of the S.S. Smurf when Brainy and a few others are accidentally cast away en route to rescue some other Smurfs captured by an evil king musician.

episodes.name: Things That Go Smurf In The Night
episodes.overview: Can Snappy make it through the night sleeping without his teddy bear?

episodes.name: Alarming Smurfs
episodes.overview: Too many alarms bug the sanity of the Smurfs while the Smurflings run away from the village.

episodes.name: Smurfette's Rose
episodes.overview: Smurfette's desire to see a blue rose causes her to smell like a rose.

episodes.name: The Mr. Smurf Contest
episodes.overview: Gargamel transforms himself into a Smurf to enter a contest to be Smurfette's escort at a dance.

episodes.name: Have You Smurfed Your Pet Today?
episodes.overview: The Smurflings abandon their duty to feed Puppy when they get caught up in Handy's stringaling craze, causing Puppy to be captured by Gargamel.

episodes.name: Unsound Smurfs
episodes.overview: The Smurflings and Baby Smurf search for a sound to break the magical barrier around the village.

episodes.name: All Work And No Smurf
episodes.overview: Brainy overworks the adult Smurfs on their day off, causing unusual transformations.

episodes.name: Gargamel's Time Trip
episodes.overview: Gargamel steals Father Time's hourglass and goes back in time to destroy the Smurfs.

episodes.name: They're Smurfing Our Song
episodes.overview: Gargamel alters Woody's panpipe to play an evil tune, but Sassette restores its happy tunes by admitting her love for her ""creator"".

episodes.name: Brainy's Smarty Party
episodes.overview: The Smurflings host their own Outcast Party, which makes Brainy's party seem like the Communist Party.

episodes.name: Smurfquest (1)
episodes.overview: Grandpa Smurf returns to the village from a 500-year voyage around the world to restore the power of the Long Life Force Stone. Papa Smurf and a few other Smurfs help Grandpa Smurf find the purest sources of the four primal elements from around the world while the remaining Smurfs stay behind to search for the Long Life Force Stone.

episodes.name: Gargamel's New Job
episodes.overview: Gargamel moves in as Prince Theodore's new sorceror while the Smurfs visit the prince.

episodes.name: Grouchy Makes A Splash
episodes.overview: Grouchy loses his fear of swimming when he sees Baby Smurf being kidnapped by Gargamel in a duck suit.

episodes.name: No Smurf Is An Island
episodes.overview: Handy designs a submarine so that he could visit Marina the Mermaid.

episodes.name: Don Smurfo
episodes.overview: Jokey's masquerade as Smurfette's storybook hero Don Smurfo puts him at risk when he has to confront Azrael to prove himself.

episodes.name: The Prince And The Hopper
episodes.overview: Smurfette falls in love with a prince who's been turned into a frog by an evil wizard.

episodes.name: Smurfette's Gift
episodes.overview: Smurfette's nose for finding out her birthday presents makes her part of an imp's collection.

episodes.name: The Most Popular Smurf
episodes.overview: Scruple puts a spell on Jokey that makes all his gag giftboxes contain actual gifts.

episodes.name: A Loss Of Smurf
episodes.overview: A suggested beauty regimen turns Vanity into a blue Wartmonger.

episodes.name: The Last Whippoorwill
episodes.overview: The Smurfs must rescue the last whippoorwill egg before insects totally invade the forest.

episodes.name: The Color Smurfy
episodes.overview: The Smurflings and Grandpa Smurf seek to restore color to a monochrome world by finding the right color in a spectrum pool to restore life to a color sprite.

episodes.name: Lazy's Nightmare
episodes.overview: Morphio is using the Smurfs' worst fears to trap them in their dreams, but Lazy finds out how to fight back against those fears.

episodes.name: All The Smurf's A Stage
episodes.overview: Timid portrays several different Smurfs to prove his acting ability to Poet.

episodes.name: Smurfs On Wheels
episodes.overview: Grandpa Smurf, Papa Smurf, and Nat prove getting to Dreamy Steamy Springs on foot is more than half the fun when Handy takes his fellow Smurfs on a wild ride in his camper.

episodes.name: The Littlest Viking
episodes.overview: Peewit does prove himself worthy of being a Viking warrior by facing the Stone King.

episodes.name: Baby's New Toy
episodes.overview: Baby loses all interest in his current toys, but the Toymaker has lost his interest in making toys. Now the Smurfs need to cheer up both.

episodes.name: Bringing Up Bigfeet
episodes.overview: The Smurflings get more practice in babysitting than they ask for when they offer to watch after Bigmouth's nephew.

episodes.name: The Scarlet Croaker
episodes.overview: Sassette, who's accidentally captured by a young Wartmonger she befriends, later finds herself and her fellow Smurfs rescued by a mysterious heroic Wartmonger.

episodes.name: Calling Dr. Smurf
episodes.overview: Dabbler devotes himself to the study of medicine.

episodes.name: Can't Smurf The Music
episodes.overview: Chlorhydris tries to take the music out of the Smurfs by doing away with the notes.

episodes.name: The Royal Drum
episodes.overview: Princess Amani from Africa visits King Gerard, and her royal drum attracts the attention of a couple of thieves.

episodes.name: It's A Puppy's Life
episodes.overview: Gargamel switches bodies with Puppy and starts making off with the Smurfs.

episodes.name: Sweepy Smurf
episodes.overview: A not-so-popular chimney cleaning Smurf gets his due when he rescues Baby Smurf from a burning house.

episodes.name: Journey To The Center Of The Smurf
episodes.overview: Miner finds a new way to keep the Smurfs warm all winter when he discovers ""dirty rocks"".

episodes.name: The Tallest Smurf
episodes.overview: Gourdy the Genie makes Slouchy the tallest Smurf by shrinking the others to ant-size.

episodes.name: Essence Of Brainy
episodes.overview: Brainy has lost his personality, and three of his fellow Smurfs have too much of his.

episodes.name: Dr. Evil And Mr. Nice
episodes.overview: Scruple gives Gargamel a magic-induced split personality.

episodes.name: The Root Of Evil
episodes.overview: Chlorhydris unleashes a destructive root that turns whoever it touches evil.

episodes.name: Tattle Tail Smurfs
episodes.overview: The Smurflings learn never to tell lies when their tails start to grow.

episodes.name: Greedy Goes On Strike
episodes.overview: An unappreciated Greedy finds new appreciation with a gnome king, who ends up taking advantage of Greedy's talents and ignoring his son.

episodes.name: Future Smurfed
episodes.overview: Lord Balthazar creates a rip in the fabric of reality with Father Time's scythe, releasing a baby dinosaur from the past.

episodes.name: Crying Smurfs
episodes.overview: Hefty learns that even a tough Smurf like him is never too tough to cry.

episodes.name: Gargamel's Dummy
episodes.overview: Jokey's puppet of Gargamel comes to life and carries out the real Gargamel's evil will.

episodes.name: Smurfs On The Run
episodes.overview: Gargamel and Sassette upset the balance of truth and deceit, and it's up to the both of them to reset the balance.

episodes.name: A Myna Problem
episodes.overview: A myna bird unwittingly protects the Smurfs from Gargamel by repeating a spell that turns them into ducks.

episodes.name: The Horn Of Plenty
episodes.overview: The Smurfs travel to the Land Of Plenty to get some of the legendary cornucopia.

episodes.name: I Smurf To The Trees
episodes.overview: Gargamel makes all the trees come to life and they decide to leave the forest.

episodes.name: Clumsy's Cloud
episodes.overview: Clumsy brings a little cloud of misfortune into the village which really needs a silver lining.

episodes.name: Bookworm Smurf
episodes.overview: The world ceases to function when Sassette wishes all the books in the world to disappear.

episodes.name: Farmer's Genie
episodes.overview: Farmer encounters Gourdy the Genie in his garden, who makes a mess of things but is allowed to stay in the village anyway.

episodes.name: Master Scruple
episodes.overview: Gourdy the Genie finds a temporary new master with Gargamel's apprentice.

episodes.name: Scruple's Sweetheart
episodes.overview: Scruple breaks Brenda's heart when he and Gargamel fight over her magic wand at the Broomstick Ball.

episodes.name: The World According To Smurflings
episodes.overview: The Smurflings learn about the balance of nature when they misuse Mother Nature's wand.

episodes.name: The Enchanted Quill
episodes.overview: Gargamel's after a magic quill that never makes mistakes to draw up a map of the Smurf Village, so Papa Smurf creates a magic quill that goofs up and switches it for the real quill.

episodes.name: The Most Unsmurfy Game
episodes.overview: The Wartmongers are using the Smurfs as prey in their hunting game.

episodes.name: Put Upon Puppy
episodes.overview: Puppy learns to be obedient when he rescues the Smurfs from Gargamel.

episodes.name: Heart Of Gold
episodes.overview: Clockwork rocks the village when Gargamel replaces his heart of gold with a heart of stone.

episodes.name: The Village Vandal
episodes.overview: A super-hungry termite causes destruction in the village, and the Smurflings are blamed for it.

episodes.name: The Gallant Smurf
episodes.overview: Hogatha turns herself into a Grandma Smurfette in order to capture Grandpa Smurf and present her to the mother of a prince as something she's never seen before.

episodes.name: Sassette's Tooth
episodes.overview: Gargamel poses himself as the Tooth Fairy to capture the Smurfs when Sassette loses her tooth.

episodes.name: Snappy's Way
episodes.overview: Snappy turns the ""doe-ray-me"" spell back on the troll that cast it on him when he accidentally buries his fellow Smurfs under an avalanche with his selfishness.

episodes.name: Fire Fighting Smurfs
episodes.overview: Snappy has a fit of conscience when he finds himself caring for wounded animals from a forest fire he accidentally created.

episodes.name: Handy's Window-Vision
episodes.overview: A crystal that transmits images to dozens of smaller crystals turns the Smurfs into ""window-vision"" watching stool potatoes.

episodes.name: Papa Smurf, Papa Smurf
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf and Gargamel are accidentally doubled, and must find some way to pull themselves (and the entire village) together.

episodes.name: Jokey's Cloak
episodes.overview: Jokey's cloak renders him permanently invisible when he gets wet wearing it.

episodes.name: Papa's Last Spell
episodes.overview: Gargamel casts a spell on Papa Smurf that blocks his ability to use magic.

episodes.name: Lure Of The Orb
episodes.overview: Poet, Handy, and Painter fall under the hypnotic lure of a magic orb that gives the illusion of heightened inspiration.

episodes.name: Smurfette's Flower
episodes.overview: A pushy sentient flower learns to respect Smurfette's kindness when it takes advantage of her.

episodes.name: Reckless Smurfs
episodes.overview: The Smurfs totally redefine ""extreme sports"" when Gargamel puts a daredevil spell on them.

episodes.name: Head Over Hogatha
episodes.overview: Cupid gives Hogatha a case of lovesickness and she falls for Gargamel, but Gargamel just wants to use her to get to the Smurfs.

episodes.name: Smurf On The Wild Side (1)
episodes.overview: The Smurfs encounter a loincloth-wearing Smurf in the forest, who turns out to be an infant lost in the forest 150 years ago and raised by squirrels.

episodes.name: The Smurflings' Unsmurfy Friend
episodes.overview: A wood sprite gets the Smurflings in trouble with all of his practical jokes.

episodes.name: The Smurfstalker
episodes.overview: A bounty hunter is terrorizing the Smurfs.

episodes.name: Poltersmurf
episodes.overview: Smurf Village is taken over by little troublesome spirits that were let loose.

episodes.name: Baby's Marvelous Toy
episodes.overview: Baby receives a toy that transforms.

episodes.name: Sleepless Smurfs
episodes.overview: Insomnia takes a hold over the Smurfs thanks to Morphio and Gargamel.

episodes.name: Cut-Up Smurfs
episodes.overview: A magic piece of paper used by Sassette for her paper dolls provides life for them as well.

episodes.name: Gargamel's Sweetheart
episodes.overview: Gragamel falls in love with the evil witch Evelyn, but she is only using him to get to the Smurfs.

episodes.name: Wild About Smurfette
episodes.overview: Wild Smurf has captured Smurfette's attention, much to the chagrin of the other Smurfs.

episodes.name: Sing a Song of Smurflings
episodes.overview: ""Music hath charms to soothe the savage beast"". The Smurflings prove this with a wild creature.

episodes.name: Smurfing for Gold
episodes.overview: Jokey's trick with gold-painted rocks causes Gargamel to get in trouble with his debtor.

episodes.name: Jokey's Joke Book
episodes.overview: If Jokey Smurf isn't surprising people with gift boxes, he's doing it with a joke bag.

episodes.name: Poet's Storybook
episodes.overview: Poet's Storybook comes to life with magic.

episodes.name: The Fastest Wizard In The World
episodes.overview: To try to beat Wild Smurf's speed, Gargamel uses a spell to break all speed records.

episodes.name: Dancing Bear
episodes.overview: A dancing bear escapes from the circus and the Smurflings are made into an act against their wills.

episodes.name: Gargamel's Last Will
episodes.overview: Gargamel thinks he'll turn into a dog by midnight when Puppy bites him, so he steals Lord Balthazar's sensor crown to capture the Smurfs before he does change.

episodes.name: Sassette's Bewitching Friendship
episodes.overview: A bumbling witch named Melina proves her worth when Gargamel is on the rampage.

episodes.name: Azrael's Brain
episodes.overview: Azrael proves that he is smarter than Gargamel thinks he is.

episodes.name: Castaway Smurfs
episodes.overview: The Smurfs get shipwrecked on an island.

episodes.name: Legendary Smurfs
episodes.overview: Gargamel thinks that Slouchy Smurf's possessions might be worth big bucks.

episodes.name: Smurfing The Unicorns
episodes.overview: Puppy is poisoned and Grandpa Smurf seeks for a rare unicorn's horn.

episodes.name: Vanity's Closest Friend
episodes.overview: Vanity's looks has finally got him an admirer. Now to get rid of the admirer....

episodes.name: Peewit's Unscrupulous Adventure
episodes.overview: Peewit's party at the castle is ruined by a chamberlain.

episodes.name: Nobody Smurf
episodes.overview: Nobody Smurf tries his best to be somebody.

episodes.name: Scruple And The Great Book Of Spells
episodes.overview: Scruple becomes a great wizard using Gargamel's book, a little too great when he freezes the entire forest.

episodes.name: Bouncing Smurf
episodes.overview: Clumsy gets trapped in a rubber tree sap drop.

episodes.name: The Clockwork Smurfette
episodes.overview: Hey, if the Smurfs can have a female counterpart, why can't Clockwork have a female companion too? That's exactly what Handy makes.

episodes.name: I Was A Brainy Weresmurf
episodes.overview: Brainy turns into a weresmurf due to a wolfbane scratch.

episodes.name: The Answer Smurf
episodes.overview: While everyone is acting like Brainy Smurf, it's up to Slouchy to take care of the village.

episodes.name: Vanity's Wild Adventure
episodes.overview: Vanity and Wild Smurf find out that they have totally different ways of life when they spend the night together.

episodes.name: Soothsayer Smurfette
episodes.overview: Smurfette unknowingly gives Baby Smurf a magic fortune teller dress.

episodes.name: Crooner Smurf
episodes.overview: Harmony can sing and is a big hit. So big that even Hogatha wants him.

episodes.name: Papa For a Day
episodes.overview: The Smurfs find out what it is like to be Papa Smurf.

episodes.name: Flighty's Plight
episodes.overview: Flighty learns about strategic decision making.

episodes.name: To Coin a Smurf
episodes.overview: Some of the Smurfs get turned into gold coins by Gargamel which get stolen by thieves.

episodes.name: Smurfette Unmade
episodes.overview: Gargamel gets Smurfette to go back to the way that he made her to capture the Smurfs.

episodes.name: Foul Feather Fiend
episodes.overview: Gargamel is turned into a bird to capture Smurfs.

episodes.name: Sassette's Hive
episodes.overview: Sassette is made a Queen Bee.

episodes.name: Little Big Smurf
episodes.overview: Oversized Snappy throws his weight around the village.

episodes.name: Locomotive Smurfs
episodes.overview: Handy creates a train for the Smurfs, which Gargamel tries to use against them.

episodes.name: A Long Tale for Grandpa
episodes.overview: Grandpa's storytelling gets in the way to saving the Smurf Village from aphids.

episodes.name: Where the Wild Smurfs Are
episodes.overview: The Smurfs try to save the squirrels from Hogatha.

episodes.name: The Magic Sack of Mr. Nicholas
episodes.overview: Chlorhydris plans to steal toys from Mr. Nicholas in order to bring instant sadness to the world.

episodes.name: Swapping Smurfs
episodes.overview: The Smurfs fall under the spell of a swapping wizard.

episodes.name: Predictable Smurfs
episodes.overview: Clumsy's clumsiness might actually save the Smurfs from the wrath of Gargamel.

episodes.name: Hefty's Rival
episodes.overview: Wild Smurf and Hefty Smurf get into it over who is the most athletic.

episodes.name: Snappy's Puppet
episodes.overview: Snappy's new hand puppet seems to have a life of its own.

episodes.name: Prince Smurf
episodes.overview: Hefty is forced to a royal marriage he doesn't really want.

episodes.name: The Return of Don Smurfo
episodes.overview: Don Smurfo explores the world outside of his storybook adventure.

episodes.name: Skyscraper Smurfs
episodes.overview: Handy and Architect create an apartment which turns out to be a worthless venture.

episodes.name: Bad Luck Smurfs
episodes.overview: Bad luck and misfortune infests on the Smurfs when Gargamel gets a hold of Lady Luck's magic wheel.

episodes.name: Smurfing Out Of Time
episodes.overview: The Smurfs try to stop time from running out when the River of Time starts drying up.

episodes.name: A Hole In Smurf
episodes.overview: Golf fever hits Smurf Village.

episodes.name: Smurf Pet
episodes.overview: The Smurflings find a Nabbit and brings him home, not knowing that he has a BIG appetite.

episodes.name: Timber Smurf
episodes.overview: A lumberjack proves his worth to the Smurf Village.

episodes.name: The Smurf Who Could Do No Wrong
episodes.overview: When Clumsy gets a 'Do No Harm Charm', everyone gets jealous of him.

episodes.name: Smurfette's Lucky Star
episodes.overview: Smurfette finds a falling star and tries to get it back in the sky.

episodes.name: The Smurfy Verdict
episodes.overview: When Baby Smurf gets lost, Brainy accuses Clumsy of irresponsibility.

episodes.name: Chlorhydris' Lost Love
episodes.overview: Chlorhydris tries to ruin all love for the Smurfs when Sassette finds her true weak spot.

episodes.name: Stop And Go Smurfs
episodes.overview: The Smurfs literally stop in their tracks to help out Painter, but a witch steals the way to make them go again.

episodes.name: Poet The Know-It-All
episodes.overview: Poet has the power to see into the future.

episodes.name: All The News That's Fit To Smurf
episodes.overview: Reporter Smurf finds a story on Grandpa Smurf that could really jeopardize him.

episodes.name: Gargamel's Quest
episodes.overview: Gargamel tries to find the Smurf Village with the help of a magic spell.

episodes.name: Gargamel's Second Childhood
episodes.overview: Gargamel and Scruple switch ages.

episodes.name: The Lost Smurf
episodes.overview: Grandpa Smurf must save Nanny Smurf, who makes her first appearance here, from a disappearing castle.

episodes.name: Archives of Evil
episodes.overview: Nemesis wants Papa Smurf's spellbook, but he ends up getting Greddy's cookbook thanks to Brainy.

episodes.name: Bigmouth's Roommate
episodes.overview: Scruple moves in with Bigmouth.

episodes.name: Bungling Babysitters
episodes.overview: The Smurfs are all arguing and no notices that Baby Smurf has been kidnapped by Hogatha.

episodes.name: Clockwork's Powerplay
episodes.overview: Clockwork Smurf experiences a power overload after being struck by lightning.

episodes.name: Clumsy in Command
episodes.overview: Clumsy proves his worth in a mountain hike by saving Brainy.

episodes.name: Don Smurfo's Uninvited Guests
episodes.overview: The Smurfs are out of place in Don Smurfo's storybook.

episodes.name: Denisa's Greedy Doll
episodes.overview: Gargamel makes Denisa's doll catch Smurfs by his magic.

episodes.name: Denisa's Slumber Party
episodes.overview: Sassette goes to Denisa's slumber party.

episodes.name: Grandpa's Nemesis
episodes.overview: Grandpa Smurf has a face-off with his long time enemy.

episodes.name: Grandpa's Walking Stick
episodes.overview: Wild Smurf is afraid of flying but when the Smurfs are about to become trees, he comes to the rescue.

episodes.name: A House For Nanny
episodes.overview: The Smurfs help Nanny find a home of her own.

episodes.name: It's A Smurfy Life
episodes.overview: Gargamel's at it again, this time using one of Handy's inventions to catch the Smurfs. It's up to Handy to save the day.

episodes.name: Land Of Lost And Found
episodes.overview: Hefty, Handy and Brainy put their own personalities into Scour Smurf so he can find Papa Smurf's telescope.

episodes.name: Long Live Brainy
episodes.overview: Just because Brainy is a leader of a group doesn't always mean that he's all that. He has to be a follower as well.

episodes.name: A Maze of Mirrors
episodes.overview: Vanity's mirror reflections come to life, much to his horror.

episodes.name: Memory Melons
episodes.overview: Selwynn is given a Memory Melon to try to help him stop quarrelling with Tullulah.

episodes.name: Nanny's Way
episodes.overview: Nanny saves the Smurfs from Gargamel and is praised.

episodes.name: Pappy's Puppy
episodes.overview: Puppy loses his memory and, even worse, Gargamel uses him to catch the Smurfs.

episodes.name: Shutterbug Smurfs
episodes.overview: Thanks to Handy's new camera, Painter might be out of a job as the official painter.

episodes.name: Smoogle Sings The Blues
episodes.overview: Smoogle and a raven get into a singing match.

episodes.name: A Smurf For Denisa
episodes.overview: Denisa becomes friends with Sassette.

episodes.name: Smurf The Presses
episodes.overview: Reporter Smurf thinks that Gargamel has changed his ways when he misunderstands his comments.

episodes.name: Stealing Grandpa's Thunder
episodes.overview: Grandpa and Wild Smurf are in danger of being captured in a trap, and Nanny and Smoogle try to trap the man who put up the traps.

episodes.name: The Smurfs That Time Forgot (1)
episodes.overview: A baby dinosaur is brought into the present time and the Smurfs try to get him back by a magic key.

episodes.name: The Smurfs That Time Forgot (2)
episodes.overview: A baby dinosaur is brought into the present time and the Smurfs try to get him back by a magic key.

episodes.name: Lost in the Ages
episodes.overview: While trying to get the dinosaur back, the Smurfs get trapped in time when they lose the key's crystals.

episodes.name: Cave Smurfs
episodes.overview: Brainy and Greedy encounter a prehistoric bird.

episodes.name: Hogapatra's Beauty Sleep
episodes.overview: In Ancient Egypt, an empress suffers from insomnia and it's up to Lazy to do his thing- sleep so she will get the idea.

episodes.name: Mummy Dearest
episodes.overview: Gargamel's Egyptian incarnation puts the Smurfs to work on building a monument for his cat pharoah Azra when they wake up a mummy that saves them.

episodes.name: Shamrock Smurfs
episodes.overview: An enchanted stew puts more than a little "Irish spring" into Greedy.

episodes.name: Karate Clumsy
episodes.overview: Clumsy does chop-sockey to an evil ninja rat.

episodes.name: Like it or Smurf It
episodes.overview: Brainy's version of Double Dare gets dangerous on a volcanic paradise.

episodes.name: Papa's Big Snooze
episodes.overview: Papa Smurf goes beddy-bye when a Japanese bug bites him.

episodes.name: A Fish Called Snappy
episodes.overview: Snappy does Mr. Limpett when he gets on a water sprite's bad side.

episodes.name: The Smurf Odyssey
episodes.overview: The Smurfs help Zeus' feeble son learn the ways of godhood on his quest for the Golden Fleece.

episodes.name: Trojan Smurfs
episodes.overview: When in Troy and Smurfette gets captured by an heiress who thinks she's a doll, the Smurfs do what the Greeks did.

episodes.name: Fortune Cookie
episodes.overview: Jokey puts some messages of his own inside the fortune cookies.

episodes.name: Imperial Panda-Monium
episodes.overview: The Smurfs must rescue a child emperor of China from Gargamel's Oriental self, who wants to usurp the throne.

episodes.name: Smurfette's Green Thumb
episodes.overview: Smurfette gets pricked by a magic plant in Babylon and turns whatever she touches into a plant.

episodes.name: Hefty Sees a Serpent
episodes.overview: Nobody believes Hefty's story about a serpent until Gargamel's Scottish counterpart captures them.

episodes.name: Phantom Bagpiper
episodes.overview: Smurfette becomes a horse jockey to help a Scottish ghost rescue his kidnapped horse.

episodes.name: Jungle Jitterbug
episodes.overview: Vanity gets some dance in his pants, which helps bring rain to a South American village.

episodes.name: The Clumsy Genie
episodes.overview: Clumsy trades places with a genie in Baghdad, and now he has to cure the Sultan's cold or else!

episodes.name: Scary Smurfs
episodes.overview: The Smurfs get turned into monsters after nibbling on a gingerbread house in Germany.

episodes.name: Sky High Surprise
episodes.overview: A band of baby bandits in the desert steal the time crystals.

episodes.name: Gnoman Holiday
episodes.overview: Julius Geezer of the Gnomans wants Smurfette as his wife, and Lazy has to fight a Gnoman gladiator to save her.

episodes.name: Greedy's Masterpizza
episodes.overview: Painter is no longer the only Smurf who can create a "masterpizza!"

episodes.name: The Monumental Grouch
episodes.overview: Grouchy has a change of heart in Rome when his likeness is taken for granite.

episodes.name: Curried Smurfs
episodes.overview: Gargamel's Far East counterpart finds and sells the Smurfs to the Rajah for his private zoo.

episodes.name: G'day Smoogle
episodes.overview: Does Smoogle find his long-lost cousin Marsupilami down under? Well, actually he finds his own ancestors down under, so who knows?

episodes.name: Grandpa's Fountain of Youth
episodes.overview: Grandpa Smurf regains his lost youth in Mexico.

episodes.name: Big Shot Smurfs
episodes.overview: Greedy and Brainy are caught up in a civil war between two groups of tiny people off the coast of Spain.

episodes.name: No Reflection On Vanity
episodes.overview: Vanity mistakes an icicle for a missing key crystal while the real missing key crystal is about to set adrift into the sea in Antarctica.

episodes.name: Papa Lose His Patience
episodes.overview: Is Papa Smurf getting as hot-tempered as those bulls chasing them around in Spain?

episodes.name: Swashbuckling Smurfs
episodes.overview: The Smurfs become unwilling shipmates for a parrot pirate.

episodes.name: Painter's Egg-Cellent Adventure
episodes.overview: Painter must get a magic chicken in Russia to start laying painted eggs again.

episodes.name: Small-Minded Smurfs
episodes.overview: A headhunter in the jungle is doing shrinky-dinks with the Smurfs' heads.

episodes.name: Bananas Over Hefty
episodes.overview: An orangutan has got the hots for Hefty.

episodes.name: Smurfs of the Round Table
episodes.overview: It's up to the Smurfs to restore honor to Camelot and wrest control of Excalibur away from Morgan Le Fay.

episodes.name: Wild Goes Cuckoo
episodes.overview: A Swiss clockmaker uses Wild Smurf in his next cuckoo clock.

episodes.name: Brainy's Beastly Boo-Boo
episodes.overview: An African storytelling stick in Brainy's hands turns his fellow Smurfs into wild animals.

episodes.name: The Golden Rhino
episodes.overview: A greedy trader steals both Prince Bakari's golden rhino and a golden Brainy.

episodes.name: Hearts 'N' Smurfs
episodes.overview: Gargamel's Dutch doppelganger puts a spell on Brainy that causes all his fellow Smurfs to spread nastiness when they take over Cupid's job.
